snippet: The coffee product maker’s management lost the confidence of Wall Street after sales estimates again fell short.
abstract: Green Mountain Coffee Roasters shares fall 48 percent to $25.87 after company cuts its outlook and again badly misses sales estimates.
lead_paragraph: The coffee product maker’s management lost the confidence of Wall Street after sales estimates again fell short.

headline.main: Green Mountain Shares Fall After Company Cuts Outlook
headline.print_headline: Green Mountain Shares Fall After Company Cuts Outlook
